query.name: find-all-dcs
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-dc-by-dc-name
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='dc-name'/> = ${dc-name} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-cluster-related-dc
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/>, <TABLE name="cluster-info"/>, <TABLE name="dc-cluster-info"/> WHERE <FIELD name="id"/> = dct.dc_id AND ct.id = dct.cluster_id AND ct.cluster_name = ${cluster-name} AND ct.deleted = 0 AND dct.deleted = 0 AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-dc-details-by-dc-name
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/>, <TABLE name="cluster-info"/>, <TABLE name="shard-info"/>, <TABLE name="dc-cluster-info"/>, <TABLE name="dc-cluster-shard-info"/>, <TABLE name="redis-info"/> WHERE <FIELD name='dc-name'/> = ${dc-name} AND <FIELD name='id'/> = dct.dc_id AND dct.cluster_id = ct.id AND dct.dc_cluster_id = dcst.dc_cluster_id AND dcst.shard_id = st2.id AND dcst.dc_cluster_shard_id = rt.dc_cluster_shard_id AND ct.deleted = 0 AND st2.deleted = 0 AND dct.deleted = 0 AND dcst.deleted = 0 AND rt.deleted = 0 AND ct.is_xpipe_interested = 1 AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-all-active-keeper
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/>, <TABLE name="cluster-info"/>, <TABLE name="shard-info"/>, <TABLE name="dc-cluster-info"/> , <TABLE name="dc-cluster-shard-info"/>, <TABLE name="redis-info"/> WHERE <FIELD name='id'/> = dct.dc_id AND dct.cluster_id = ct.id AND dcst.dc_cluster_id = dct.dc_cluster_id AND dcst.shard_id = st2.id AND rt.dc_cluster_shard_id = dcst.dc_cluster_shard_id AND rt.keeper_active = 1 AND ct.deleted = 0 AND st2.deleted = 0 AND dct.deleted = 0 AND dcst.deleted = 0 AND rt.deleted = 0 AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: total-count
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name="deleted"/> = 0

query.name: find-all-clusters
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-cluster-by-cluster-name
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='cluster-name'/> = ${cluster-name} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: delete
query.statement: UPDATE <TABLE/> SET <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 1 WHERE <FIELD name='id'/> = ${id} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-dc-cluster-by-id
find-dc-cluster-by-name
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/>, <TABLE name='dc-info'/>, <TABLE name='cluster-info'/> WHERE <FIELD name='dc-id'/> = dt.id AND <FIELD name='cluster-id'/> = ct.id AND dt.dc_name = ${dc-name} AND ct.cluster_name = ${cluster-name} AND dt.deleted = 0 AND ct.deleted = 0 AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-all-by-cluster-id
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='cluster-id' /> = ${cluster-id} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: delete-batch
query.statement: UPDATE <TABLE/> SET <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 1 WHERE <FIELD name='dc-cluster-id' /> = ${dc-cluster-id} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-all-by-cluster-id
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='cluster-id' /> = ${cluster-id} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-all-by-cluster-name
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/>, <TABLE name='cluster-info'/> WHERE <FIELD name='cluster-id' /> = ct.id AND ct.cluster_name = ${cluster-name} AND ct.deleted = 0 AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-shard
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/>, <TABLE name='cluster-info'/> WHERE <FIELD name='shard-name'/> = ${shard-name} AND <FIELD name='cluster-id'/> = ct.id AND ct.cluster_name = ${cluster-name} AND ct.deleted = 0 AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: delete-shards-batch
query.statement: UPDATE <TABLE/> SET <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 1 WHERE <FIELD name='id'/> = ${id} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-dc-cluster-shard
find-dc-cluser-shard-by-name
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/>, <TABLE name='dc-info'/>, <TABLE name='cluster-info'/>, <TABLE name='shard-info'/>, <TABLE name='dc-cluster-info'/> WHERE <FIELD name='shard-id'/> = st2.id AND <FIELD name='dc-cluster-id'/> = dct.dc_cluster_id AND st2.shard_name = ${shard-name} AND dct.dc_id = dt.id AND dct.cluster_id = ct.id AND dt.dc_name = ${dc-name} AND ct.cluster_name = ${cluster-name} AND dt.deleted = 0 AND ct.deleted = 0 AND st2.deleted = 0 AND dct.deleted = 0 AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-all-by-dc-cluster-id
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='dc-cluster-id' /> = ${dc-cluster-id} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-all-by-shard-id
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='shard-id' /> = ${shard-id} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-all-by-dc-cluster-names
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/>, <TABLE name='dc-info'/>, <TABLE name='cluster-info'/>, <TABLE name='dc-cluster-info'/> WHERE <FIELD name='dc-cluster-id'/> = dct.dc_cluster_id AND dct.dc_id = dt.id AND dct.cluster_id = ct.id AND dt.dc_name = ${dc-name} AND ct.cluster_name = ${cluster-name} AND dt.deleted = 0 AND ct.deleted = 0 AND dct.deleted = 0 AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: insert-batch
query.statement: INSERT INTO <TABLE/>(<FIELDS/>) VALUES(<VALUES/>)

query.name: delete-dc-cluster-shards-batch
query.statement: UPDATE <TABLE/> SET <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 1 WHERE <FIELD name='dc-cluster-shard-id'/> = ${dc-cluster-shard-id} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-all-by-dc-cluster-shard-id
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='dc-cluster-shard-id' /> = ${dc-cluster-shard-id} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: delete-batch
query.statement: UPDATE <TABLE/> SET <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 1 WHERE <FIELD name='id'/> = ${id} AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-by-dc-name
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/>, <TABLE name="dc-info"/> WHERE <FIELD name='dc-id'/> = dt.id AND dt.dc_name = ${dc-name} AND dt.deleted = 0 AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-active-by-dc-name
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/>, <TABLE name="dc-info"/> WHERE <FIELD name='dc-id'/> = dt.id AND dt.dc_name = ${dc-name} AND <FIELD name='metaserver-active'/> = 1 AND dt.deleted = 0 AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-by-dc-name
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/>, <TABLE name="dc-info"/> WHERE <FIELD name='dc-id'/> = dt.id AND dt.dc_name = ${dc-name} AND dt.deleted = 0 AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-all
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/> WHERE <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0

query.name: find-by-dc-name
query.statement: SELECT <FIELDS/> FROM <TABLE/>, <TABLE name="dc-info"/> WHERE <FIELD name='keepercontainer-dc'/> = dt.id AND dt.dc_name = ${dc-name} AND dt.deleted = 0 AND <FIELD name='deleted'/> = 0
